meanings.definition: The act or process of making watches.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy learning about the intricate watchmakings in creating timepieces.
meanings.sent2: His passion for watchmakings led him to become a skilled watchmaker.
meanings.sent3: The watchmakings of the clock were so precise that it never lost a second.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the watchmakings of her craft was evident in the flawless timepieces she produced.
meanings.sent5: The watchmakings of the old pocket watch were a testament to the craftsmanship of the past.

meanings.definition: The skills and techniques involved in making watches.
meanings.sent1: Mastering the intricate watchmakings requires patience and precision.
meanings.sent2: The watchmakings of a skilled artisan can be seen in the fine details of the watch.
meanings.sent3: His lack of watchmakings was evident in the poorly assembled timepiece.
meanings.sent4: She honed her watchmakings over years of practice, becoming a renowned watchmaker.
meanings.sent5: The watchmakings of the expert were unmatched, producing timepieces of exceptional quality.
